attributes.action: Allow England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland a vote on gaining political independence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, believe that the constituent nations of the United Kingdom (England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland) should each be entitled to hold a referendum to allow their populations to decide whether or not they wish to remain a part of the UK political union. A truly democratic state would not ignore the overwhelming wishes of its citizens.
